markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Sacral Monarch](/Feats.aspx?ID=3838) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
<trait label="Oracle" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=319" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 177</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Sacral Lord](/Feats.aspx?ID=3837); Master in [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) or Master in [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)

</column>

---

You have come into your full powers and are truly a monarch of your realm, by your own definition at least. While in your territory, you can cast [_banishment_](/Spells.aspx?ID=19) and [_inevitable disaster_](/Spells.aspx?ID=930) as innate divine spells, each once per day.
name: Sacral Monarch
prerequisite: Sacral Lord; Master in Occultism or Master in Religion
